Package todolist

Class ToDoList

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • todolist.ToDoList
  • public class ToDoList
extends javafx.application.Application
    This class contains the core logic used for adding, updating, displaying tasks. It contains the UI controller logic and business logic needed.
    Author:
    Sandeep Nadella
